title: Gwyneth Paltrow is a woman on the go as she's spotted leaving the gym make-up free
text:
She's a talented Oscar and Emmy winner who's making a grand return to acting this season in the new Netflix comedy The Politician.

And on Thursday, actress Gwyneth Paltrow was seen leaving a gym in Los Angeles, makeup free and with a determined look on her face.

The Shakespeare In Love muse, 47, wore a grey 'Beaver' sweatshirt, black leggings, and white sneakers as she carried some bags along with her car keys and smartphone.

Athletic actress: On Thursday, Gwyneth Paltrow was seen leaving a gym in Los Angeles, makeup free and with a determined look on her face

The actress and Goop entrepreneur's hair looked wet from the shower post-workout.

Paltrow had an eventful week last week, starting off with her first Emmy appearance since 2011, and the first time she walked a red carpet with her husband of one year, TV producer Brad Falchuk.

Brad and Gwyneth met when they worked together on his TV collaboration with Ryan Murphy and Ian Brennan, Glee, for which Paltrow won an Emmy in 2011 for Outstanding Guest Actress in a Comedy Series.

Then last Thursday in New York, she and Brad attended the premiere of their latest TV venture, The Politician.

Woman on a mission: The Shakespeare In Love muse wore a grey 'Beaver' sweatshirt, black leggings, and white sneakers

Not so newlyweds: Last week, Paltrow made her first Emmy appearance since 2011, marking the first time she walked a red carpet with her husband, TV producer Brad Falchuk

Couple and co-workers: After the Emmys in New York, she and Brad attended the premiere of their latest TV venture The Politician

The following day marked Gwyneth's 47th birthday, and for the occasion a friend posted a gorgeous photo on Instagram of the birthday girl with her mother, actress Blythe Danner, as well as her 15-year-old daughter with ex Chris Martin, Apple.

Danner, 76, is an accomplished actress in her own right, having appeared in the Meet The Parents film franchise among many other projects.

The day before her daughter was seen leaving the gym back in LA, Blythe was spotted strolling down the street in New York, looking regal in a straw hat, peach blouse, crumpled burgundy skirt and red sandals.

Along with Gwyneth, Blythe and her late husband Bruce Paltrow have son Jake, 44, who is a film director like his father was.

Gwyneth also has a son with Coldplay's Chris Martin, 13-year-old Moses.

Three beauties: For the occasion of Gwyneth's birthday last Friday, a friend posted a gorgeous Instagram snap of the birthday girl with her mom, actress Blythe Danner, and daughter Apple
description: She's an Oscar and Emmy winner who's making a grand return to acting this season in the new Netflix comedy The Politician.
